K14dhppat_u:317: kṣudhā parama rogāṇāṃ saṃskārā duḥkham eva tu /

K14dhppat_u:334: yatrāsau jāyate vīras tat kulaṃ sukham edhate //

K14dhppat_u:338: spṛṣṭā hi dukhena tathā sukhena noccāvacāḥ satpuruṣā bhavanti //

K14dhppat_u:343: sukhā najjo sūpatitthā sukho dhammajito jano /

K14dhppat_u:347: sukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ śīlavanto sukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ bahuśśutā /
K14dhppat_u:348: arahanto pi sukhaṃ draṣṭuṃ vipramuttā niropadhī //

K14dhppat_u:445: na hi pāpakaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ sajjaṃ śastam va kantati /

K14dhppat_u:466: pāpā pāpehi kaṃmehi nirayaṃ te upapajjatha //

K14dhppat_u:475: yo hy apraduṣṭasya narasya duṣyate śuddhasya nityaṃ vigatāṅgaṇasya /

K14dhppat_u:589: etaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bandhanam āhu dhīrā ohārinaṃ sukhumaṃ dupramuñcaṃ /
K14dhppat_u:590: etappi chettāna vrajanti santo anapekhino sabbadukhaṃ prahāya //
